articles.title: Hackers can steal cryptographic keys by video-recording power LEDs 60 feet away - Ars Technica
articles.description: Key-leaking side channels are a fact of life. Now they can be done by video-recording power LEDs.
articles.content:
Enlarge/ Left: a smart card reader processing the encryption key of an inserted smart card. Right: a surveillance camera video records the reader's power LED from 60 feet away.
